title: What champion should i get
body:
Hello, I main mid lane and occasional top or jungle and I was wondering what champions you guys would recommend to me, I already have a really good pool but im just looking for another fun champ to have.

These are my current champs that I play

Mid: Zed, Veigar, Ahri, Ekko, Yasuo, Fizz, Katarina, Vel Koz, Lissandra, TF, Lux, Talon, Annie, Azir, Leblanc, Heimerdinger
Top: Fiora and Darius
Jungle: Fiddlesticks and Udyr

Some of my friends suggested Riven, Malzahar and Zac, just want to see anyone elses opinions.

Thank you for any suggestions! :)

replies.body:
Irelia and Akali are both good top laners, you may also want to consider Warwick.
You may also want to get Jhin (Marksman/Assassin).
Volibear, Olaf and Nocturne are good top laners too.
Ziggs is also a good midlaner.
ChoGath is another good one (Tank/Mage)

Note, I don't own all of these champions, in the above list, I only own Irelia.
Irelia is pretty good by the way, she may not be that good in early game, but as soon as she gets to level six, she would shine.
The only problem with Irelia is that she relies on items to make her perform better, so if you plan to get her, you need to get items frequently if you use her.
I have used Jhin quite a number of times (even though I don't own him), but he is really good ranged champion.
You can get Riven, she is not hard to use but she may not be too easy to master, I used Riven and I did not find her to be that much of an OP champion, and I had beaten Riven quite a few times using Irelia and Garen.

If I was to recommend a champion to you just by looking at your current champion pool, I'd probably say Illaoi. Shes super fun and actually quite strong at the moment because she just recently got buffed.

And if you enjoy play Illaoi, definitely try out Kled when he's on the free week in a couple of weeks. I just got him yesterday, and he is super fun as well, and actually has a surprisingly similar play style to Illaoi.

Your champion pool is very similar to mine, and I absolutely love riven. Definitely try her out, she is just such a fun champion, even if people consider her 'OP'. She's one of those champions you can just never stop getting better at.

Anyway, good luck with finding a new champion bro :)

Depends on how you see fun
If fun is winning, easier champs like amumu would be good
mechanics - azir, riven etc
trolling - any champ bard's passive is pretty fun
and other stuff, so it really depends on your playstyle

I like winning games, however I don't like REALLY easy champions, that's why my friends were telling me to get riven because apparently she's really good however she isn't easy. I also like lane bullying and dealing hefty damage early and mid game.

Poppy is a pretty fun top laner. Fighting as her can be interesting due to the shield and wall mechanics inlane. Low cooldown Q is fun as well. She's cheap too and fits into teams nicely as a tank who can deal a fair amount of damage. If you're looking into someone a bit more expensive, Illaoi is a pretty interesting champion as well. If you want to try ADC, I'd recommend Miss Fortune (Mainly cos she's the only one I play). She does alot of damage, and her in lane Q poke can seem pretty insane at times.

Thank you! :) 

I think both Illaoi and Poppy are great, however i really enjoy incredibly offensive and bursty lane bullies. Your descriptions seem really elaborate, so im wondering if you have any more suggestions under what I like to play. More Bursty, annoying to deal with champs like zed or fiora. Would really appreciate it! :)

Pantheon then. Takes a bit for him to get fed and he falls off lategame, but if you can get fed super early he's a pain. Top lane he has the obnoxious Q poke, Jungle he has the point and click stun. Either way, you can get fed in both and it's fun while it lasts.

Urgot top/mid.

Bully people people out of lane , then destroy them 1v1 once you get your ult.
